IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SUPPORTS THE DEVELOPMENT OF EQUESTRIAN SPORTS THROUGH THE STAGING OF EVENTS AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL. EEI SEEKS TO PROVIDE DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR RIDERS, HORSES, AND EQUINE ORGANIZATIONS, AND TO ELEVATE THE COMPETITIVENESS OF THE UNITED STATES INTERNATIONALLY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: SUPPORTS THE DEVELOPMENT OF EQUESTRIAN SPORTS THROUGH THE STAGING OF EVENTS AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL. EEI SEEKS TO PROVIDE DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR RIDERS, HORSES, AND EQUINE ORGANIZATIONS, AND TO ELEVATE THE COMPETITIVENESS OF THE UNITED STATES INTERNATIONALLY.
IRS990.Desc: KENTUCKY HORSE TRIALS: SERVES AS A VEHICLE FOR SELECTION OF U.S. EQUESTRIAN TEAMS THAT COMPETE NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY. THIS YEAR, APPROXIMATELY 76 STARTERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GRANTS TO VARIOUS PUBLIC CHARITIES - SEE SCHEDULE I.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LOBBYING EXPENSES WERE PAID TO BABBAGE/INTER SOUTH TOWARDS THE REPEAL OF SALES TAXES FOR NON-PROFITS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO PROVIDE FUNDS TO THE GENERAL FUND FOR USE IN OPERATING EXPENSES TO FURTHER THEIR EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS PROVIDE DETAILS OF THE SPECIFIC EQUIPMENT PURCHASED AND/OR THE AMOUNT USED TO HELP FURTHER THEIR EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRIM HUDGINS, A DIRECTOR, IS THE DAUGHTER OF MARY WATHEN, A DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE ELECTRONICALLY. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WILL BE PROVIDED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD IN HARD COPY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT IS SIGNED BY EACH DIRECTOR ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT AND DUALITY OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST, AND AT THE DISCRETION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND MANAGEMENT.
